content: When users log in to Salesforce, either via the user interface, the API, or a desktop client Salesforce CRM confirms the log in is authorized using all of the following EXCEPT:
options: A. Salesforce CRM then checks whether the user's profile has IP address restrictions. If IP address restrictions are defined for the user's profile, any login from an undesignated IP address is denied and any login from a specified IP address is allowed
B. Salesforce CRM checks whether the organization has login hour restrictions. If login hour restrictions are specified, any login outside the specified hours is denied.
C. Salesforce CRM checks whether the user's profile has login hour restrictions. If login hour restrictions are specified for the user's profile, any login outside the specified hours is denied.
D. If profile-based IP address restrictions aren't set, then Salesforce CRM checks whether the user is logging in from an IP address she or he hasn't used to access Salesforce CRM before
